attributes.action: Stop prisons being so nice for offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prisons are there for 3 reasons
Punishment, Rehabilitation, To deter reoffending

Why are there video games, pool tables, sky TV etc. in prisons?
Non of these things punish, rehabilitate or deter people from committing offences. They should be removed from prisons with immediate effect
I agree that prisoners should be fed healthily but with basic food - If they want nice tasty food then they stop committing offences
They need a gym to keep fit and they need education and training
But if they want to play games or watch televisions then they should stop committing crime
Prison as a tool should be somewhere that people come out and say "that was bad, I don't ever want to go there again"

I am a police officer and I have heard several persistent offenders tell me that prison is great and they don't care about being caught for committing crime because they will get a short stint in one of these big youth clubs where they can have a laugh and make friends - They are laughing at you, the police and the government - Prime minister you have to see how wrong this is.
If prison was tough your prisons wouldn't be full

Sign this petition to request prisons are looked at and changed to be a proper punishment
